select A.PROJECT_TITLE, A.PROJECT_CODE, C.CHANGED_FILE_NAME
, count(D.PROJECT_CODE) as count
from tbl_project A left join tbl_approval_history B ON (A.PROJECT_CODE = B.PROJECT_CODE) left join tbl_project_file C ON (A.PROJECT_CODE = C.PROJECT_CODE)
left join samjo.tbl_project_option tpo on A.PROJECT_CODE = tpo.PROJECT_CODE left join samjo.tbl_project_tag tpt on A.PROJECT_CODE = tpt.PROJECT_CODE left join samjo.tbl_project_category tpc on A.PROJECT_CATEGORY = tpc.CATEGORY_CODE
left join tbl_like_project D ON (A.PROJECT_CODE = D.PROJECT_CODE)
where B.APPROVAL_STATUS = 'Y' and C.FILE_TYPE='Representative_image'
AND A.PROJECT_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{ searchValue }, '%') or tpt.TAG_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{ searchValue }, '%')
AND A.PROJECT_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{ searchValue }, '%')
AND tpt.TAG_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{ searchValue }, '%')
AND tpc.CATEGORY_NAME='음료'
AND tpc.CATEGORY_NAME='주류'
AND tpc.CATEGORY_NAME='베이커리'
AND tpc.CATEGORY_NAME='해외음식'
AND tpc.CATEGORY_NAME='채소'
AND tpc.CATEGORY_NAME='해산물'
AND tpc.CATEGORY_NAME='과일'
AND tpc.CATEGORY_NAME='냉동식품'
AND tpc.CATEGORY_NAME='소스'
AND tpc.CATEGORY_NAME='디저트'
group by A.PROJECT_TITLE ORDER BY A.PROJECT_TITLE ASC
group by A.PROJECT_TITLE ORDER BY tpo.PRICE asc
group by A.PROJECT_TITLE ORDER BY tpo.PRICE desc
group by A.PROJECT_TITLE order by count desc
group by A.PROJECT_TITLE ORDER BY A.SUBMISSION_DATE desc
LIMIT #{ startRow }, #{limit}
